definition: the Qinghai-Tibet route
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
storehouse/depository/Buddhist or Taoist scripture
Tibet/Xizang 西藏
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
variant of 線|线[xian4]

sentences.english: Speaking of the roads to Tibet, the most frequently taken is still the Qinghai-Tibet route.
sentences.chinese: 说起进藏的路，走的最多的还是青藏线。
